name: Star Charting on the Cheep
description:
Why should I use a controller?

Due to an unfortunate bug, keyboard walking is backwards and mouse look is inverted!  Therefore you'll want a controller unless you hate yourself.  Sorry for the inconvenience.   I aim to fix this once uploads are allowed again (after the jam voting ends).

CONTROLS

Move: WASD / Left Analog

Telecope: Right Click / R or L Bumpers

Jump: Space / A or B Buttons

Chart Stars : Left Mouse / A or B Buttons

You're a chill bird, who's just trying to see how many constellations one can spot in an evening.  Turns out they are hard to find, but not too hard to make up.

Solo developed in 48 Hours for the GMTK 2021 Jam.  All art was produced during the jam.  Audio was obtained third party.
